name: Jonathan Hernandez - Cybersecurity and Risk Professional, Community Leader, Public Speaker
description: Jonathan Hernandez is a dedicated Cybersecurity and Risk Professional, Community Leader, and engaging Public Speaker. Originally from the Philippines, he moved to Ohio at 19 and worked his way up from a restaurant job to cybersecurity through a state internship. Jonathan earned an associate degree and has experience at a Fortune 100 company and top hospitals. Heâ€™s known for his inspiring talks at major conferences and webinars, where he shares his journey and motivates others. Connect with Jonathan on LinkedIn to follow his impressive career.
